tr.td: Bonnie presents today for results of MSU after presenting last week with symptoms suggestive of a UTI. MSU sent and was given triprim one daily for 7 days. She developed urticaria to the triprim, so this was stoped and after checking MSU report changed to kelfex 500mg tds.

act.text: Bonnie presents today for results of MSU after presenting last week with symptoms suggestive of a UTI. MSU sent and was given triprim one daily for 7 days. She developed urticaria to the triprim, so this was stoped and after checking MSU report changed to kelfex 500mg tds.
